    G

    main.GameBoard - Class in Unnamed Package
    Represents the game board for Bomberman, composed of a 2D array of main.Tile objects.
    main.GameBoard(char[][], int, int, main.Tile[][]) - Constructor for class main.GameBoard
    Constructs a main.GameBoard from a character sample layout.
